Detailed Description

template<class function>
class C4DView::FunctionSlot< function >

Class template to outsource redundant code.

Class template to outsource redundant code for the generation of functions in a slot called by QActions from the QMenu

Parameters:
function the Function to be created in the slot

Member Function Documentation

template<class function>
void C4DView::FunctionSlot< function >::createFunction ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, static]

Factory method to create a new Function of type R^3->R.

This function template is called by each slot with the correct function type as template parameter.
Sets F to the newly created Function, checks the corresponding menu item, updates the ValuesDialog and redraws.

References C4DView::AssignValues(), ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), ValuesDialogImpl::dv(), C4DView::F, Loki::SingletonHolder< T, CreationPolicy >::Instance(), C4DView::menu, C4DView::Redraw(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), Menu4D::updateFunctionMenu(), C4DView::Values, ValuesDialogImpl::vmax(), and ValuesDialogImpl::vmin().

template<class function>
void C4DView::FunctionSlot< function >::createSurface ( C4DView *  view  )  [inline, static]

Factory method to create a new Function of type R^2->R^4.

This function template is called by each slot with the correct function type as template parameter.
Sets F to the newly created Function, checks the corresponding menu item, updates the ValuesDialog and redraws.

References C4DView::AssignValues(), ValuesDialogImpl::dt(), ValuesDialogImpl::du(), C4DView::F, C4DView::menu, C4DView::Redraw(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmax(), ValuesDialogImpl::tmin(), ValuesDialogImpl::umax(), ValuesDialogImpl::umin(), Menu4D::updateFunctionMenu(), and C4DView::Values.
